description: A bearish reversal pattern that forms after an uptrend, characterized by three peaks with the middle peak (head) being the highest. Signals potential trend reversal from bullish to bearish.

structure: Must have exactly three peaks: left shoulder, head (highest), and right shoulder
Head must be significantly higher than both shoulders (typically 10%+ higher)
Shoulders should be at approximately equal price levels (within 5-10% variance)
Clear neckline connecting the lows between peaks
Pattern should form after a sustained uptrend (not in consolidation or downtrend)
volume: Volume should decrease progressively: highest at left shoulder, lower at head, lowest at right shoulder
Strong volume spike on neckline break confirms the pattern
Declining volume during formation is a key validation signal
indicators: RSI showing bearish divergence (lower highs while price makes higher highs) strongly validates
MACD histogram decreasing or crossing below signal line supports
Momentum indicators (Stochastic, RSI) should be overbought (>70) during head formation
timeframe: Most reliable on daily and 4H charts
Can appear on any timeframe but requires more confirmation on lower timeframes
Pattern should develop over weeks or months, not hours

invalidation_signals: Volume increasing through formation (suggests continuation, not reversal)
Shoulders at significantly different price levels (>15% variance)
Head not clearly higher than shoulders
No clear neckline can be drawn
Price breaks above right shoulder before neckline break
Pattern forms in downtrend or sideways market (not after uptrend)
RSI shows bullish divergence instead of bearish
common_mistakes: Mistaking any three peaks for Head and Shoulders without checking shoulder symmetry
Ignoring volume - valid patterns need declining volume
Calling the pattern too early before neckline break
Finding pattern in wrong market context (needs prior uptrend)
Confusing with triple top (which has all three peaks at similar levels)

trade_setup.entry: Enter short on neckline break with close below neckline
trade_setup.stop_loss: Place above right shoulder or above head for more conservative approach
trade_setup.target: Measure head-to-neckline distance, project same distance below neckline break
